channel.title: Nethistory on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Nethistory on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Spam: A Shadow History of the Internet - Finn Brunton - MIT Press - 2013
item.description: Finn Brunton has a new book out, called "Spam: A Shadow History of the Internet", published by the MIT Press. I'm looking forward to reading it this summer. Some radio interviews about the book: An interview with NPR's Scott Simon on Weekend Edition. CBC's Spark, in 2010. and some print: Roar so wildly: spam, technology and language. From Radical Philosophy 2010. This is the raw text output of a chat session with a bot I modified to act as an interlocutor.
